languages.text: "Госпожа губернатор... убита еретиками?!" {n}Секретарь осеняет себя защитным знаком.{/n} "Да охранит нас Бог-Император! Мы немедленно отыщем виновных!"

traits.locale_text: "Госпожа губернатор... убита еретиками?!" {n}Секретарь осеняет себя защитным знаком.{/n} "Да охранит нас Бог-Император! Мы немедленно отыщем виновных!"

languages.text: "The governor... killed by heretics?" {n}The secretary makes a protective sign over himself.{/n} "God-Emperor protect us! We'll soon root out those responsible!"
languages.original_text: "Госпожа губернатор... убита еретиками?!" {n}Секретарь осеняет себя защитным знаком.{/n} "Да охранит нас Бог-Император! Мы немедленно отыщем виновных!"

traits.locale_text: "The governor... killed by heretics?" {n}The secretary makes a protective sign over himself.{/n} "God-Emperor protect us! We'll soon root out those responsible!"
"The governor... killed by heretics?" {n}The secretary makes a protective sign over himself.{/n} "God-Emperor protect us! We'll soon root out those responsible!"
"The governor... killed by heretics?" {n}The secretary makes a protective sign over himself.{/n} "God-Emperor protect us! We'll soon root out those responsible!"
"The governor... killed by heretics?" {n}The secretary makes a protective sign over himself.{/n} "God-Emperor protect us! We'll soon root out those responsible!"

languages.text: “总督……被异端分子杀害了？”{n}秘书对自己做了个祈祷的手势。{/n}“愿神皇保佑我们！我们很快就会把那些凶手绳之以法！”
languages.original_text: "The governor... killed by heretics?" {n}The secretary makes a protective sign over himself.{/n} "God-Emperor protect us! We'll soon root out those responsible!"

traits.locale_text: “总督……被异端分子杀害了？”{n}秘书对自己做了个祈祷的手势。{/n}“愿神皇保佑我们！我们很快就会把那些凶手绳之以法！”

languages.text: «Los herejes... han matado a la gobernadora?». {n}El secretario hace una señal de protección.{/n} «¡Que el Dios Emperador nos guarde! ¡Atraparemos de inmediato a los responsables!».
languages.original_text: "The governor... killed by heretics?" {n}The secretary makes a protective sign over himself.{/n} "God-Emperor protect us! We'll soon root out those responsible!"

traits.locale_text: «Los herejes... han matado a la gobernadora?». {n}El secretario hace una señal de protección.{/n} «¡Que el Dios Emperador nos guarde! ¡Atraparemos de inmediato a los responsables!».

languages.text: 「総督が…異端者に殺された？」{n}秘書官は身を守るように自分を庇う仕草を見せる。{/n}「神帝陛下、お守りください！首謀者を掃討しましょう！」
languages.original_text: "The governor... killed by heretics?" {n}The secretary makes a protective sign over himself.{/n} "God-Emperor protect us! We'll soon root out those responsible!"

traits.locale_text: 「総督が…異端者に殺された？」{n}秘書官は身を守るように自分を庇う仕草を見せる。{/n}「神帝陛下、お守りください！首謀者を掃討しましょう！」

languages.text: "Die Gouverneurin ... von Ketzern getötet?" {n}Der Sekretär macht ein Schutzzeichen.{/n} "Der Gottimperator schütze uns! Wir werden die Verantwortlichen schon bald auslöschen!"
languages.original_text: "The governor... killed by heretics?" {n}The secretary makes a protective sign over himself.{/n} "God-Emperor protect us! We'll soon root out those responsible!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Gouverneurin ... von Ketzern getötet?" {n}Der Sekretär macht ein Schutzzeichen.{/n} "Der Gottimperator schütze uns! Wir werden die Verantwortlichen schon bald auslöschen!"

languages.text: « La gouverneure... s'est fait tuer par des hérétiques ? Que l'Empereur-Dieu nous protège ! {n}s'exclame le secrétaire en faisant un signe protecteur.{/n} Nous trouverons les coupables sans tarder ! »
languages.original_text: "The governor... killed by heretics?" {n}The secretary makes a protective sign over himself.{/n} "God-Emperor protect us! We'll soon root out those responsible!"

traits.locale_text: « La gouverneure... s'est fait tuer par des hérétiques ? » Que l'Empereur-Dieu nous protège ! {n}s'exclame le secrétaire en faisant un signe protecteur.{/n} Nous trouverons les coupables sans tarder ! »

languages.text: "Vali... Kâfirlerce öldürüldü mü?" {n}Yazman, eliyle kendine doğru bir korunma işareti çiziyor.{/n} "Tanrı imparator hepimizi korusun! Sorumlu olanları derhâl gün yüzüne çıkaracağız!"
languages.original_text: "The governor... killed by heretics?" {n}The secretary makes a protective sign over himself.{/n} "God-Emperor protect us! We'll soon root out those responsible!"
